snippet: The investigation is looking at a perk that granted the chief executive, Aubrey McClendon, a share in each of the natural gas producer’s wells.
abstract: Securities and Exchange Commission escalates its investigation into Chesapeake Energy and its chief executive Aubrey McClendon over perk that granted him share in each of natural gas producer's wells.
lead_paragraph: The investigation is looking at a perk that granted the chief executive, Aubrey McClendon, a share in each of the natural gas producer’s wells.

headline.main: S.E.C. Increases Scrutiny of Chesapeake Energy
